infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Enatbet needs camera access to take photos of your property listings.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Enatbet needs photo library access to select images for your property listings.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Enatbet needs permission to save photos to your library.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Enatbet uses your location to show nearby properties and help guests find your listing.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Enatbet uses your location to show nearby properties.

plugins.photosPermission: Enatbet needs access to your photos to upload property images.
plugins.cameraPermission: Enatbet needs access to your camera to take property photos.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Enatbet uses your location to show nearby properties.
